The Integrity Edit

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0a07268e861621d00be87773865c4e4c135883949.png> 	

The Integrity Edit | Ethics Newsletter provides updates on the initiatives we have launched, and the statistics related to our Speak Up® platform during the second half of 2024, as well as on upcoming projects.
Read full overview in English <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=965&user=10620> and Arabic. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=966&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-4-min.png> 	

Launching Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/b9490de14c4d85a5c5bb9868e5ae5992511461187.gif> 	

Announcing a landmark launch for our region first time ever, the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses with Transitions® lenses are officially available in the UAE!

These innovative smart glasses combine Meta AI technology with Transitions® lenses that seamlessly adapt from clear indoors to dark outdoors, offering a stylish and intelligent wearable experience like never before.

Available from May 12th, you can shop the new Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses from these stores <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=967&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=968&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!  
You can also refer your network directly through our I <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=969&user=10620> nternal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=969&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
